text.label: Notes: All AP buttons must be pressed and held for 1/4 second to activate. Activating autopilot without a mode selected will hold current pitch and roll.
HDG: Set heading bug with knob on pedestal.Press top of knob ( push HDG sync ) to set the hdg bug to current heading..Press HDG to activate.
NAV: Set desired course with knob on pedestal.Press top of knob ( push CRS direct ) to set course to current heading.
APPR: Arms autopilot for ILS approach. Nav radio must be tuned to ILS frequency. Glideslope will not activate unless localizer is captured
